articles.description: JACKSON, Wyo. (AP) — An avalanche trapped a delivery truck and closed a pass in western Wyoming.
articles.content:
JACKSON, Wyo. (AP) An avalanche trapped a delivery truck and closed a pass in western Wyoming.
The driver was alone in the truck and unhurt.
The slide on Teton Pass, on Wyoming Highway 22 near the Idaho line, happened around midday Thursday.
